channel.title: Connection help
channel.description:
ok..i followed the instruction on rune_L0c3s...... i did every thing right i think and people can still not connect to me...so i need help...
im running windows 7 64-bit cpu Tukolscape source 508
PLEASE...
PS...im using Norton 2 if that has any thing to do with it?

item.title: Connection help
item.dc:creator: @sponge_bong sponge bong
item.description:
@sponge_bong wrote:

make sure you portforward to port 43594 or 5555 then make sure you have no-ip running. for when ur running a client you use the ip “127.0.0.1” and when other people use client they use what ur ip is on no-ip.

Read full topic
